betterquesting:10.desc:8:
For your first machines, you will be needing §6Masonry Bricks.
§fThese are like the culmination of your efforts.

You will need stone, from pit-kilning Cobblestone. Then, you need Bricks from that stone. Then, you need to hammer those into slabs and those slabs into bricks.

Once you do have around 2-3 stacks of these, you will be able to make Stone Machinery.

This is a new tier of machinery, and they require lots of coal. So make sure to get as much charcoal/coal as you can for this tier.
